thread.title: How positive thinking is actually making us miserable | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: How positive thinking is actually making us miserable | Daily Mail Online

author: Svend Brinkmann For The Daily Mail
title: How positive thinking is actually making us miserable | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad We're endlessly told to be positive. But now one psychologist reveals... the power of saying NO! Professor of Psychology Svend Brinkmann believes positive thinking is actually making us miserable because it sets us up to fail Instead, he says, we should embrace the negative and look to Stoicism Let the Stoics inspire you to find new ways to live with this seven-step guide Published: 23:30 GMT, 12 February 2017 | Updated: 23:30 GMT, 12 February 2017 138 shares
